short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stops the annoying 'browser unsupported' message when using chrome on my.parkland.edu

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redefines the checkBrowsers() function on my.parkland.edu, preventing it from displaying that annoying message every time you go there with chrome.
